Title: Imposes a tax on corporate lobbying expenditures
Summary: Imposes a tax on corporate lobbying expenditures; imposes a tax of 35% on corporate lobbying expenditures above $100,000 and below $500,000; imposes a tax of 60% on corporate lobbying expenditures above $500,000 and below $1,000,000; imposes a tax of 75% on corporate lobbying expenditures above $1,000,000.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to imposing a tax on corporate lobbying expenditures
